data.title: Canada's Theatre Museum
data.meta_description:
We extend our sincere thanks to the artists, directors, and theatre makers who generously contributed their time to create the Legend Library. We also acknowledge the many partners and donors whose support make this project possible.



Kate Barris in memory of Herbert WhittakerDavid and Alexandra B
data.text:
We extend our sincere thanks to the artists, directors, and theatre makers who generously contributed their time to create the Legend Library. We also acknowledge the many partners and donors whose support make this project possible.

Kate Barris in memory of Herbert Whittaker

David and Alexandra Bednar

The Joan and Clifford Hatch Foundation

The Fleck Family

The William and Nona Heaslip Foundation

John McKellar

Playwrights Guild of Canada

The Professional Association of Canadian Theatres (PACT)

The School of Radio and Television Arts, Toronto Metropolitan University
